message: I use the middle mounse button for opening links in a new tab (linux standard behaviour). However this does not work on convore, for example when I want to go through the list of unread topics in a group and want to open some in the background for reading after I'm done with the list. I guess due to heavy javascript tricks, clicking with middle button works as left button here - and opens in the current tab. Which annoys the hell out of me. :-)
Yes, this is driving me crazy! Started happening today.
Sorry about this, guys, we're exploring ways to fix it
Occurs when links behaviour is actually controlled by javascript
It's cool. Twitter and others break it all the time.
i can't find it broken, everything i click with middle button opens in new tab (winXP with FF 3.6 here)
